query:
SELECT 
            u.id,
            u.username,
            u.display_name,
            u.avatar_url,
            u.bio,
            COUNT(DISTINCT f.follower_id) as follower_count,
            EXISTS(
                SELECT 1 FROM follows 
                WHERE follower_id = $1 AND following_id = u.id
            ) as "is_following!"
        FROM users u
        LEFT JOIN follows f ON u.id = f.following_id
        WHERE u.id != $1
        GROUP BY u.id
        ORDER BY follower_count DESC, u.created_at DESC
        LIMIT $2
